item.title: Listing all your blogposts
item.description: So here is a quick snapshot at how to get all your wordpress blogposts using python [or wordpresslib to be specific] – #!/usr/bin/env python import wordpresslib import tinyurl wordpress = raw_input(‘‘Wordpress URL:’’) user = raw_input(‘‘Username:’’) password = raw_input(‘‘Password:’’) prepare client object wp = wordpresslib.WordPressClient(wordpress, user, password) select blog id wp.selectBlog(0) posts = wp.getRecentPosts(100) for p in posts: if p.title.find(“p=”)<0: print p.title," - “,tinyurl.create_one(p.link) – Now that is real easy to use IMHO, i just started using this in one of my scripts.
